entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4 except minus 9 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 except minus 9 inland. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8 except minus 13 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 13 inland. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023
